admreg: Middle East and North Africa,Middle East and North Africa
trustfund:
TF026611-PHRD-INDIA: UTTAR PRADESH
            SINGRAULI INSTITUTIONAL DEV. PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The Mehardeh Power Project includes: (i)
            construction of the first 125-MW stage of a steam-electric
            power station at Mehardeh; (ii) construction of four new
            230-kV substations and expansion of four existing
            substations; (iii) training for EPE staff in management and
            engineering; and (iv) engineering and management consulting services.
